data.title: Microsoft (MSFT) Extends Collaboration With Deutsche Telekom
data.text: Microsoft (MSFT) and Deutsche Telekom are teaming up to ramp up cloud migration for customers.

data.title: Wintel Wars: Apple's Revenge On Microsoft And Intel
data.text: We discuss how Apple has spent two decades setting the stage for its return to dominating the PC industry. We cover the complex relationships between Apple, TSMC, Microsoft, and Intel.

data.title: Microsoft's Outlook also faces intermittent outage, amid crash across multiple Google services
data.text: It's not nearly on the same scale as Google's outage earlier today, but it turns out that Microsoft's Outlook email service has been having problems, too. Readers are reporting to us, and an update on Microsoft's site status for its various Office services confirms, that some Outlook users may not be able to sign in […]

data.title: Microsoft, Nintendo, and Sony commit to making gaming safer
data.text: The three big game console makers -- Microsoft, Nintendo, and Sony -- have teamed together to commit to making gaming safer for everyone.

data.title: The 7 Best Dow Jones Stocks to Buy Now As You Ready for the Coming Year
data.text: For those who are put off by the extreme enthusiasm of this bull market, the usually reliable Dow Jones stocks offer much-needed balance. Here are seven to consider.
